caption:
Meet our newest member of the Excelsia team in our Pennsylvania market, Dr. Leonard Bruno, who we're spotlighting for #NationalPhysiciansWeek.

Dr. Bruno is board certified by the American Board Of Neurological Surgery (ABNS) and is a Fellow of the American College of Surgeons and the International College of Surgeons.

Receiving his medical degree from Columbia University, Dr. Bruno went on to complete several internships, residencies, and fellowships at various hospitals in and around Philadelphia and New York. He became Chief of Neurosurgery during his time at both Germantown Hospital & Medical Center and Graduate Hospital and was named a Philly "Top Doc" by Philadelphia Magazine for several years.

We are proud to have Dr. Bruno as part of our Excelsia team!

#PhysicianAppreciation #Neurosurgery #DrBruno #ABNS #ExcelsiaTeam
